attributes.action: Sack Adam Crozier and Peter Mandleson with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adam Crozier and Peter Mandelson have deliberately engineered a situation in which a strike by the CWU has become inevitable. Shareholders need a management who can work in partnership with the union and staff to change the Royal Mail for the benefit of everyone. These two men are making a bad situation worse by their arrogance and incompetence.
